summary: Started comprehensive codebase refactoring. Identified issues: incorrect import paths in App.tsx, duplicate components, i18n import paths need fixing. Fixed: main.tsx i18n import, LanguageToast i18n import, LanguageSwitcher i18n import, Gallery component renamed from NewGallery. Created refactoring plan. Next: fix App.tsx imports, remove duplicate components, test build.
current_status: Refactoring in progress. Fixed critical import paths (i18n). Identified duplicate components and incorrect import paths. Need to fix App.tsx imports and remove duplicates. Build currently failing due to incorrect import paths.
